name: Trade Atlas
tag_list: importers-search-engine, b2b, e-commerce, small-business, sourcing, exporting
overview:
Trade Atlas is an e-commerce website with its extensive electronic database providing information about importer companies. Also, Trade Atlas is an electronic database that is designed to enable producer/exporter companies to find customers.

The importer companies figured on the database have engaged and are still engaging in imports at their country of origin.

Through Trade Atlasâ€™s up-to-date database, you can directly have access to importer companies information in all sectors of a country ranging from needle to space shuttle (approximately 200.000 product/product groups). In this way, you can easily contact with the importer companies in our database and develop exports and business dealings with them.

All information on Trade Atlas database is up-to-date. The 90 % of importer companies have web sites in our database.

You can make search by both HS Code and product name (keyword) through â€œTrade Atlas Product Classification Systemâ€, which is formed in accordance with the Customs Tariff Schedule.

The list of importers companies of the countries on our database is continuously updated. Moreover, Trade Atlas is going to expand its importers database by including one more country on its database every two month.

Furthermore, Trade Atlas ensures the advertisement and promotion of producer and exporter companies on its electronic platform by providing their contact information, company profiles and detailed information of their products. In this way, importer companies can easily keep contact with righteous and reliable producer/exporter companies. Importer companies can search exporter/producer companies by both HS Code and product name (keyword) through â€œTrade Atlas Product Classification Systemâ€, which is formed in accordance with the Customs Tariff Schedule.
